titles.title: We Will Come And Bow Down

properties.copyright: 1984 Integrity's Hosanna! Music, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I will come and bow down
at Your feet, Lord Jesus,
In Your presence
is fullness of joy.
There is nothing,
There is no one
who compares with You.
I take pleasure
in worshiping You, Lord.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
We will come and bow down
at Your feet, Lord Jesus,
In Your presence is fullness of joy.
There is nothing,
There is no one
who compares with You.
We take pleasure
in worshiping You, Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Heaven is Your throne
And the earth is Your footstool.
Jesus, we come to
bow down at Your feet.
O how we love just
to worship before You.
In Your presence
our joy is complete so
